library.description: Syntactic sugar for setTimeout and setInterval.
library.name: wait

library.description: Utility to separate into parts and to format time duration in milliseconds.
library.name: duratiform

library.description: Use this plugin to unobtrusively add a datetimepicker, datepicker or timepicker dropdown to your forms
library.name: DateTimePicker

library.description: A highly-customizable, jQuery-compatible datepicker/timepicker (calendar/clock widget) and a powerful Date/String parse/format utility.
library.name: Any+Time™ JavaScript Library

library.description: Numeral.js is a tiny JS library for formatting and manipulating numbers.  Formats include number of decimals, currency, percentages, time, and more. It is lightweight, easy to localize, has no dependencies, and is available for use in the browser as well as node.js.
library.name: Numeral.js

library.description: The timepicker addon adds a timepicker to jQuery UI Datepicker, thus the datepicker and slider components (jQueryUI) are required for using any of these. In addition all datepicker options are still available through the timepicker addon.
library.name: jQuery Timepicker Addon
